patthana23.2:4.1: Nakusalaṃ navipākaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato vipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana23.2:5.1: Naakusalaṃ navipākaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato vipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana23.2:6.1: Nakusalaṃ navipākañca naakusalaṃ navipākañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato vipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana23.2:8.1: Nakusalaṃ navipākadhammadhammaṃ paccayā kusalo vipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.2:8.2: Nakusalaṃ navipākadhammadhammaṃ paccayā akusalo vipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.
patthana23.2:9.1: Naakusalaṃ navipākadhammadhammaṃ paccayā akusalo vipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.
patthana23.2:10.1: Nakusalaṃ navipākadhammadhammañca naakusalaṃ navipākadhammadhammañca dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo vipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.
patthana23.2:12.1: Nakusalaṃ nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.2:13.1: Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha … pe … aññamaññe tīṇi … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate cha.
